div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 165 Greece, central, c. 1949 Burial: c. 250 B.C. or later (T) Contents: c. 80 AR Chalcis: 30 dr.; 1 triob. Euboean League: 49 dr. Disposition: M. Wallace, Toronto Although the two lots are listed separately, Wallace indicates his belief that they are from the same hd. In connection with no. 11, he describes other material said to have been included in the find but points out that this is highly unlikely
